title: Blueberry Toasts and Smoothie
desc: Just have a single bite of this Black Forest pastry and it will all make a proper sense tto you. The kkick of cherry and rich chocolate of this super light, airy pastry will definately make you feel 'wow'. The perfect combination of cherry cream and rich chocolate can provide the utimate fufillment to your dessert craving.
shortdesc: The in-house toast and smoothie by Chef Kim

title: Crockpot Honey Garlic Meatballs
desc: Frozen beef meatballs slung into the crockpot and cooked with a delicious honey garlic sauce! So simple and so addictive! These beautiful bites are made for the holidays, game day, movie night or any time you want a big batch of scrumptious appetizers!
shortdesc: The meatballs dipped in garlic sauce by Chef Moose

title: Burger and Fries
desc: The burger is cooked medium with a nice and juicy pink centre that tastes great. I is then filled with some hot and crunchy jalapeños, a crispy bacon and some thin slices of red onion
shortdesc: The in-house burger and fries by Chef Moose

title: Lemon Butter Garlic Pasta
desc: This a classic Italian pasta dish. It’s said to originate in Sicily, but it’s popular in several regions where lemons are grown in abundance. This simple dish combines pasta noodles (usually spaghetti) with fresh lemon, butter, olive oil, salt and pepper, and optionally cream and parmesan.
shortdesc: The in-house garlic pasta by Chef Kim

title: Stir Fry Pasta
desc: This delicious meal prepared by parboiling and frying pasta with stir-fried vegetables and pepper. It is a good source of carbohydrate and vitamins as it contains pasta and veggies. The carrot, garlic and ginger are not just good for flavour but also good for nutrients
shortdesc: The in-house pasta and chicken by Chef Moose

title: Cabbage Soup
desc: It is a comforting and healthy low calorie meal! It consists of sliced cabbage with mirepoix vegetables, diced tomatoes, vegetable broth, and herbs for an easy and delicious, low calorie meal.
shortdesc: The in-house soup by Chef Kim
